name: Darker Squares
description:
This started out as a CSS for just my profile on BronySquare but i kept expanding on it for months (i was working very slow on it and it was my first time doing and learning CSS) until i had covered the entire site

Background credit: http://haventide.deviantart.com/
additional_info:
v1.0.8 - Updated broken background, sorry about that
v1.0.7 - Updated background and a bunch of other little stuff that i forget
v1.0.6 - Updated the positioning of the notification menu
v1.0.5 - Tidied up the look of the "Share" buttons 
v1.0.4 - Updated style to properly theme and place the new button on the dashboard that lets you display new posts without needing to refresh the whole page + some minor cosmetic changes
v1.0.3 - Sites changed domain, updated to reflect change
v1.0.2 - Bugfix
v1.0.1 - Visual fix for a new site feature
v1.0.0 - First public release
